name: The SPOOM!
description:
Hello,

A little game to start somewhere, it's my very first solo project so please be compliant. 
Please  don't forget to check the options/controls.

Made on GameMaker Studio 2.

ALL ROYALTY FREE MUSICS DESERVE TO KEVIN MACLEOD.
All musics available here: https://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/music.html 

ALL SPRITES AND TILESETS ARE BASED ON SPRITES AND TILESETS FROM SPRITE DATABASE. 

All sprites and tilesets available here: https://spritedatabase.net/

Have Fun!
